revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #35 Belue |image = [[File:Belue.png]] |caption = This glossy and colorful Berry has a mouthwateringly delicious appearance. However, it is awfully sour. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 10% |mutation = 0.02% |points = 1,100 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *30 sour }} '''Belue''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Nomel]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sour and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Nomel]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 23 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 43 mins 20 secs || 4 hours 1 min 40 secs || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- !Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours 30 mins -
11 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 3 hours 40 mins -
7 hours 20 mins || 44 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 26 mins 40 secs -
5 hours 53 mins 20 secs || 30 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Belue_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Belue berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
